form.name: datacapture
form.brief: Metadata extensions for UTS Data Capture

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: Will appear as the dataset's title in the Research Data Catalogue and RDA

parameter.name: description
parameter.brief: A short description of this dataset

parameter.name: creator
parameter.description: If you don't have an NLA ID, contact eResearch-it@uts.edu.au

parameter.name: project
parameter.brief: A single-line description of the project or program.
parameter.description: Can be a UTS or external grant number, or your own description

parameter.name: supervisor
parameter.brief: The name of your supervisor, if you are an HDR student.
parameter.description: The name of your supervisor, if you are an HDR student.

parameter.name: coverage
parameter.brief: The spatial coverage of the dataset
parameter.description: A brief textual description of the spatial coverage of this dataset.

parameter.name: public
parameter.description: If this box is checked, the dataset will be published to Research Data Australia, where it will be discoverable by other researchers and the public.
